attributes.action: Ensure that Baby P gets justice and order a retrial of the Baby P Three
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Baby P three have been convicted of “causing or allowing the death of a child” carrying a maximum sentence of 14 years. 

How could they be found innocent of manslaughter or murder when Victoria Climbie's carers were convicted of murder and sentenced to life imprisonment?  Both Baby P and Victoria are dead as a result of deliberate systemetic physical abuse, so how can there be such a huge discrepancy in convictions?

Please ensure that Baby P gets justice by signing this petition to demand a retrial.

Those who abused him and eventually killed him deserve no less than life imprisonment.

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
